ISO3.description: Three-letter country codes defined in ISO 3166-1

Continent.description: Continent where the country is located

value_dict.Asia: Countries located in the Asian continent
value_dict.Africa: Countries located in the African continent
value_dict.Europe: Countries located in the European continent
value_dict.America: Countries located in the American continent
value_dict.Oceania: Countries located in the Oceania continent

Hemisphere.description: Hemisphere where the country is located

value_dict.Northern Hemisphere: Countries located in the Northern Hemisphere
value_dict.Southern Hemisphere: Countries located in the Southern Hemisphere

Human Development Groups.description: Group categorization based on human development index

value_dict.Low: Countries categorized as having low human development
value_dict.Medium: Countries categorized as having medium human development
value_dict.High: Countries categorized as having high human development
value_dict.Very High: Countries categorized as having very high human development

HDI Rank (2021).description: Ranking of the country based on the Human Development Index in 2021
